columns.name: name
columns.description: The display name of a saved backup plan.

columns.name: arn
columns.description: An Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that uniquely identifies a backup plan.

columns.name: backup_plan_id
columns.description: Specifies the id to identify a backup plan uniquely.

columns.name: creation_date
columns.description: The date and time a resource backup plan is created.

columns.name: deletion_date
columns.description: The date and time a backup plan is deleted.

columns.name: last_execution_date
columns.description: The last time a job to back up resources was run with this rule.

columns.name: creator_request_id
columns.description: An unique string that identifies the request and allows failed requests to be retried without the risk of running the operation twice.

columns.name: version_id
columns.description: Unique, randomly generated, Unicode, UTF-8 encoded strings that are at most 1,024 bytes long. Version IDs cannot be edited.

columns.name: backup_plan
columns.description: Specifies the body of a backup plan.

columns.name: advanced_backup_settings
columns.description: Contains a list of BackupOptions for a resource type.

columns.name: rules
columns.description: Contains a list of Rules for a resource type.
